title: Vision in the forest
creator_contributor_role: United States. Dept. of Agriculture, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection - Citizen participation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildlife conservation
description: Film trailer on forest fire prevention. While a family enjoys their camping trip in the forest, one of the children wanders away, and sees a vision:  a cartoon character, Smokey Bear, comes alive in his fire prevention poster, and lectures on how people can befriend the forest and its wild creatures.
